subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: During an 11-year stretch, through 2013, the A.L. East produced two playoff teams in every season except 2006. Now, the weakness of the division is the primary factor giving hope to all five of its teams.
snippet: During an 11-year stretch, through 2013, the A.L. East produced two playoff teams in every season except 2006. Now, the weakness of the division is the primary factor giving hope to all five of its teams.
